page.title: 20Lundy- a sort of poem.
page.content: Hi!We went to Lundy-it was ACE. We went to our rooms(The Quarters) the girl's place,while the boys went to The Barn. Up above the road was the farm. Later we had a little walk on the eastern side,everyone objected to the idea-they all tried to hide. Then Sunday we were going to walk the whole island-the BIG day.Later we went down to the Landing Beach to have a swim -what in the middle of May! Alright then we'll save it for another day.In the morning we went to the shop, they have ace things in there,it's the top. Later we went to the church where there are bells on the ground which do not make a sound.John Ogilvy showed us the garden,I stepped on some flowers and begged his pardon.Then sadly the days went past,suddenly it was time to go home-it had all gone so fast! {Charlotte Owen.
